item.description:
Guitar Under the Stars

 

Don’t miss this sensational line up of local and international guitarists performing a gamut of musical styles. Daniel Salazar, Jr. takes the evening stage accompanied by the Hartford Festival Orchestra in this signature concert featuring Spanish, Latin, and World Music. In addition, several of New England’s top guitarists will perform a variety of music styles throughout the afternoon. 

Food and beverages including beer and wine will be available for purchase.

View a clip of the 2008 Guitar Under the Stars. 

 

Bring a blanket to sit on and a snack to share if you'd like to.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the top of the stairs nearest to the stage
item.name: Guitar Under the Stars
